column1: * Given the increased budget estimate, I've decided to make the following changes.
* Re-introduce the Cross Region Read Replica for RDS.
* Upgrade RDS Master Instance to 'db.m5.8xlarge' family.
* Upgrade RDS Multi AZ Read Replica to 'db.m2.4xlarge' family.
* Upgrade Application and Web Server EC2 instances to 'c5.4xlarge' family, and increase count to 8.
